title: DSC 106: Lab 1
description: Created a simple web page using soley HTML and uploaded it through GitHub Pages.

title: DSC 106: Lab 2
description: Styled the web page with the addition of CSS, providing vibrant colors, toggle effects, and better layouts.

title: DSC 106: Lab 3
description: Implemented web page elements through JavaScript automations and developed better visual effects such as the dark and light modes.

title: DSC 106: Lab 4
description: Utilized JavaScript to fully realize the projects page while adding three recent projects and GitHub statistics into the home page.

title: DSC 106: Project 1
description: Analyzed the food processing dataset and drew conclusions on how certain baby food brands produces healthier, cheaper products by visualizing the trends on a bar line graph.

title: DSC 106: Project 2
description: Analyzed the climate change and emissions dataset to argue a proposition with two visualizations, in which one argues for the proposition and the other against.

title: League of Legends Analysis
description: Analyzed the League of Legeneds gameplay statistics.

title: Network Simulation Research
description: Researched on how misinformation spread within a network of communicating individuals.

title: Game: Finding Bomb
description: Developed a simple game where the user has to avoid the bomb hidden in a certain sized grid.

title: Game: Keyboard Madness
description: Developed a simple game where the user has to press keys to survive.

title: Game: OutWorld
description: An attempt to use Unity to create a 2D game.
